designs.name: Modern Corporate Bank Branch
designs.description: Professional and secure bank branch with a modern corporate look
designs.flooring: Polished vitrified tiles or stone flooring
designs.walls: Neutral walls with branded accent panels
designs.zones: Teller counters, waiting area, service desks
designs.prompt_keywords: modern bank branch interior, corporate banking hall

designs.name: Premium Banking Lounge
designs.description: High-end bank branch offering personalized and premium services
designs.walls: Textured walls with wood or stone panels
designs.prompt_keywords: premium bank branch, luxury banking interior

designs.name: Digital-First Bank Branch
designs.description: Technology-driven branch focused on digital banking services
designs.walls: Matte walls with digital display panels
designs.prompt_keywords: digital bank branch, smart banking interior

designs.name: Customer-Friendly Bank Branch
designs.description: Warm and welcoming bank interior designed for comfort
designs.prompt_keywords: customer friendly bank interior, welcoming banking hall

designs.name: High-Security Bank Branch
designs.description: Bank branch designed with maximum security and controlled access
designs.prompt_keywords: secure bank branch, high security banking interior

designs.name: Retail Banking Branch
designs.description: Efficient branch optimized for high customer footfall
designs.prompt_keywords: retail bank branch interior, high footfall banking hall

designs.name: Microfinance / Rural Bank Branch
designs.description: Accessible and friendly branch for rural and microfinance customers
designs.prompt_keywords: rural bank branch interior, microfinance office design

designs.name: Heritage-Style Bank Branch
designs.description: Classic bank branch inspired by traditional architecture
designs.prompt_keywords: heritage bank interior, classic banking hall

designs.name: Green Sustainable Bank Branch
designs.prompt_keywords: green bank branch, sustainable banking interior

designs.name: Budget Functional Bank Branch
designs.description: Cost-effective bank branch maintaining clarity and security
designs.prompt_keywords: budget bank branch, functional banking office
